column1: A little boy named @entity2 did not like to brush his teeth. One day, as his mother asked himto brush his teeth, @entity2 said, "I do not want to! It's gross and a waste of time!" @entity1, @entity2's mom told him that in order for him to grow up and be big and strong likeshe is, he must brush his teeth. In disgust, with his mom watching to make sure he brushedhis teeth right, he brushed his teeth and whined until he was finished. The next day, @entity0 not brush his teeth and told his mom that he did. After going to school, one of @entity2'sfriends said that his breath stunk and began to make fun of him. This made @entity2 veryangry, so he pushed the boy over and started to cry. A teacher came over and called theprincipal as both kids were being loud and starting a fight. @entity2's mom came to school andtook him home. After asking what was wrong, @entity2 told his mom that he did not brush histeeth. After hearing this, his mom marched him up to the bathroom and forced him to brushhis teeth. "You wo not get teased if you brush your teeth, @entity2!" she yelled, and then leftthe room. From that day forward, @entity2 brushed his teeth every day so the other kidswould not make fun of him.
@placeholder did @entity2 do after his mom yelled at him
he brushed his teeth every day after that.
